conversation.name: Dumbledore
conversation.label: Dumbledore:
conversation.phrase: Ah, yes, I see Harry Potter's eleventh birthday is coming up. Since his relatives are Muggles, should we do the customary house visit a week before his birthday?

conversation.name: Minerva
conversation.label: Minerva:
conversation.phrase: No, Albus, I think I'm just going to fuck that Vernon Dursley up with 500000000 owl letters. *puts on shades and ollies out*
I'm so glad I hired that woman.
